sentences.en: A mother I knew was going through a really unpleasant time with a stroppy teenage son.
sentences.cn: 我认识的一位母亲因为十几岁的儿子脾气暴躁、任性叛逆而过得很不开心。

sentences.en: A pair of teenage boys were smoking cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 两个十来岁的男孩正在吸烟。

sentences.en: By this time Pitt had become a teenage idol.
sentences.cn: 皮特此时已经成为青少年崇拜的偶像了.

sentences.en: He gave a talk on the theme of teenage unemployment.
sentences.cn: 他就青少年失业的主题作了一次报告.

sentences.en: He is too old now for teenage parties.
sentences.cn: 他年龄太大了,不适于参加少年聚会.

sentences.en: Hendrix's stage presence appealed to thousands of teenage rebels.
sentences.cn: 亨德里克斯在台上的风采吸引了成千上万的叛逆少年。

sentences.en: Men and teenage girls pair up to dance.

sentences.cn: 充满青少年焦虑的歌曲

sentences.en: Teenage conceptions have risen steadily in the last ten years.
sentences.cn: 过去10年中，少女怀孕的现象不断增多。

sentences.en: Teenage disco music pumped out at every station.
sentences.cn: 每一站都喧闹地播放着十几岁少年所喜爱的劲爆迪斯科音乐。

sentences.en: Teenage idols have a strong influence on our children.
sentences.cn: 青少年偶像对孩子们的影响非常深。

sentences.en: The country is in the grip of a teenage crime wave.
sentences.cn: 青少年犯罪的激增让该国陷入困境。

sentences.en: The police believe the fight was due to a dispute between rival teenage gangs.
sentences.cn: 警察认为这场打斗是由两个敌对的青少年帮派之间的纠纷引起的。

sentences.en: the problems parents have with their teenage offspring
sentences.cn: 父母与青少年子女之间的问题

sentences.en: The teenage attackers fled when the two men fought back.
sentences.cn: 当那两名男子还击时，袭击他们的少年逃之夭夭。

words.tran_cn: 十几岁的青少年；十三岁到十九岁的少年

phrases.tran_cn: 忍者神龟（美国动画电影）
